message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product at a special introductory price of $9,500. This is a limited-time offer, so I encourage you to consider it carefully.
Alice,  I appreciate the offer, but I'm looking to pay closer to $8,500. This is a fair price considering your own valuation and my budget.  Let's see if we can reach an agreement.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and am willing to negotiate further. I would like to offer the product to you for $9,000. This price reflects the value of the product while also allowing us to reach a mutually beneficial agreement.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate further.  While I'm closer to your offer, I'm still hoping to land at $8,750. This would give us both a good deal and allow for a swift transaction. Let me know your thoughts.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob. After considering your latest offer, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I propose to sell the product to you for $8,875. This price allows us to both feel satisfied with the transaction.
